entry.title: DRMAAv2 C Binding - bug #114: job template naming is different: drmaa2_j_get_jt() versus drmaa2_jarray_get_job_template()
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to accepted

Very reasonable.
We had several renamings of API parts during the process, so this is a sad left-over.

entry.title: DRMAAv2 C Binding - bug #114: job template naming is different: drmaa2_j_get_jt() versus drmaa2_jarray_get_job_template()
entry.content:
• Status changed from accepted to final review

The OGF-42 meeting decided for the following renamings:

drmaa2_jarray_get_job_template becomes drmaa2_jarray_get_jtemplate
drmaa2_j_get_jt becomes drmaa2_j_get_jtemplate

entry.title: DRMAAv2 C Binding - bug #114: job template naming is different: drmaa2_j_get_jt() versus drmaa2_jarray_get_job_template()
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to closed

Fixed in the July 2015 errata.
